import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import NavBlock from './NavBlock' import CurrentWeather from './CurrentWeather' import clouds from './img/cloud.png' import rain from './img/rain.png' import clear from './img/sun.png' import mist from './img/mist.png' import snow from './img/snow.png' const API_KEY = 'a43370d07c332057a138f54300a5a38a' const images = { 'Clouds': clouds, 'Haze': mist, 'Mist': mist, 'Clear': clear, 'Rain': rain, 'Snow': snow, } export default function App() { const [location, setLocation] = useState('') let temp if(location !== ''){ fetch(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${location}&units=metric&appid=${API_KEY}`) .then(data=> data.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)).catch(console.log('404')) } return (
) }
